name: GyroPace
description:
Your "A" and "D" Keys are your friends. You steer with them.

This is the HTML5 version. There are mobile downloadable versions of this game where you use the Gyroscope of the phone to play the game.

Avoid colorful things as they will reset your progress.

The counter at the top of the screen gives an indication of how far in the level you have come.

There are 8 levels:

2 x Speed Run

3 x Circular Track

3 x Washing Machine

The levels get harder as the levels progress.

That's all you need to know to play, we hope you enjoy!
